title: Billy Madison
short_plot_summary: Billy Madison, a spoiled rich man-child, must go back to school and complete each grade in just two weeks to prove himself worthy of inheriting his father's business.
explanation: A pencil, representing Billy's need to study and participate in school
A school bus, symbolizing Billy's journey through the different school grades
A school building, where the majority of the story takes place
A fire, alluding to the memorable scene where Billy extinguishes a fire set in his school
A heart, representing the romance between Billy and his teacher, Veronica
